name: Bistro Boulevard for iOS
description:
Just released for iPad! Help hometown eateries recover from the recession in Bistro Boulevard. Use your time management skills to turn one modest cafe into a promenade of five-star restaurants!

Bistro Boulevard was once a thriving food court, home to the best fixings in town. Sadly, the recession all but closed down the entire promenade and just one cafe remains. As its newest owner, you have the power to turn things around and get the restaurant bustling once again. Can you make all of the right decisions and bring the customers back?

Full Version Features:

* 17 unique achievements and 6 restaurants
* Hire staff, pick the menu, and decorate your cafe to impress your customers
* Experiment with ingredients to discover new recipes
* Upgrade your kitchen with high-end equipment to cook fancy recipes and speed up your service
* Manage seating your customers with easy to master drag a drop game play, friendly for the whole family.

Download and play today!
